titles.title: Electing Members to a certain standing committee of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct

bill.summary: 1/22/2009--Passed House without amendment. Elects certain named Majority Members to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct, including the Chairman.
